segments.text: I'm just watching this kitchen scene unfold before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink seems completely lost in thought, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea that the water is actively gushing over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating quite a large puddle on the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually in the water, yet she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is fully open, just letting the water run everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause a terrible mess and probably some significant damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the water sloshing onto the wooden cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange kind of calm, given the imminent disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice before the whole floor is submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with her meticulous plate drying is almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of absentmindedness is truly astounding to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
